Kalu Egbui Ikeagwu bụ onye omere na odee na onye Naijiria na Britain
Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ọ natala ọtụtụ onyinye na nhọpụta maka ihe ngosi ya na ihuenyo.
A mụrụ Kalu na England mana nna ya bugara ya na Nigeria mgbe ọ dị afọ 9 n'ihi egwu ndị mụrụ ya na-atụ na ọ nwere ike gbahapụ mgbọrọgwụ Igbo
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na England na Zambia tupu ọ gawa mahadum nke Nigeria iji nweta nzere bekee
Ihe mbụ Ikeagwu pụtara na ihuenyo bụ n'afọ 2005 na usoro Domino TV nke ama ama
Ihe ngosi nke izizi ya bụ na Put Out The Houselights nke Esiaba Ironsi mere
Ọ gakwara n'ihu ime ihe n'ụfọdụ egwu egwu Naijirịa na-echefu echefu, dị ka "Major Lejoka Brown" na Ola Rotimi 's, Di Anyị Agawala ara ọzọ nakwa dịka "RIP" n'Eziaba Irobi's Hangmen Also Die
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eme egwuregwu dị iche iche na Ememme Edinburgh nke 1995 na 1997
Ihe nkiri mbụ ya gosipụtara bụ ọrụ "David Salako" na Emem Isong's For Real , Kalu mechara ihe nkiri ahụ, Kalu kwuru na ọ bụrụ na otu Danfo (Lagos metro bus) ga-akụ ya, na ọ ga-anwụ na ihu ọchị dị ụtọ
.  O na-apụta na ọtụtụ fim gụnyere 30 Days, The Njọ Woman, anya n'etiti, N'etiti Ụwa Abụọ na Irish film mmepụta "Rapt Na Éire"
Na telivishọn, o meela n'ọtụtụ usoro ewu ewu gụnyere Domino, 168 na ndị dọkịta na-ahụ maka anọ (MNet Production)
A makwa ya maka ọrụ ya dịka "Alahji Abubakar" aka Nna-ukwu na Naijiria kụrụ usoro TV Tinsel
Kalu Ikeagwu egosiputana n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na nso nso a
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nwere nkà nke pụtara na fim dị ka 30 Days, Domino, Accident, Broken, Damage Two Brides na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ
Ntụgharị nke ihe nkiri ise kacha ewu ewu o mere na ya
Na 2019, Ikeagwu pụtara na "The Three Thieves", nke ndị atọ Sammy Egbemawei, Abba Makama, na Africa Ukoh dere; and featuring Angel Unigwe
Ihe nkiri ahụ pụtara na sinima na Naịjirịa n'abalị anọ n'October nwere Babtunwa Aderinokun na Uche Okocha dịka onye nrụpụta ùgwù na onye na-emepụta ihe
